casebody.data:
LG ELECTRONICS, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
INTERDIGITAL COMMUNICATIONS, LLC, et al. No. 13-796. Supreme Court of the United States April 21, 2014.

Case below, 718 F.3d 1336 .

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit with instructions to dismiss the case as moot. See United States v. Munsingwear, Inc., 340 U.S. 36 , 71 S.Ct. 104 , 95 L.Ed. 36 (1950).
